content.prompt: The author’s view of the sixteenth century was most likely influenced by which of the following?

choices.label: The ongoing divisions and conflicts with Christianity in spite of the Catholic Reformation
The spread of new diseases in Europe after the discovery of the Americas
The loss of power by some traditional aristocracies
The end of the Thirty Years’ War

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
